testCase.title: Prepare sandwich
testCase.steps:
1. Buy 1 bread, tomato and butter.
  2. Slice the bread.
  3. Spread the butter on the slice and salt softly.

testCase.title: Prepare tea
testCase.steps:
1. Boil some water.
  2. Pour the hot water into an empty cup with a tea bag.
testCase.result: Cup with extremely hot content is prepared.

testCase.title: Eat open sandwich
testCase.steps:
1. Open your mouth.
  2. Insert a bite of open sandwich.
  3. Chew the bite for 15 seconds and swallow.
testCase.result: Repeat 15 times, wait 15 minutes and your hunger is gone.
